page.title: 20LIFE-STYLES_FASHIONS_
page.content: The fashion in this area is quite upto date when viewed alongside the latest fashion in Britain.For instance a lot of girls are wearing skirts of a length which goes just below the knee. Baggy clothes are also fashionable for men and women.Jeans or coloured canvas trousers similar to jeans are worn. Baggy dresses and T.shirts or jumpers are fashionable for girls.As regards hair fashion the following seems to be vogue in our area.Boys seem to be getting perms rather than skinhead cuts which are not as popular as they used to be.Now boys prefer medium length hair at the back and spiked on the top,or medium length and curly at the back and straight on top.Girls however go for a loose perm which is called a Demiwave,or alternatively a wet look perm which has wet gel applied to it to make it look wet.
